name: Duke Street
overview: Duke Street is a leading Private Equity group, with offices in the UK and France and more than â‚¬2 billion committed capital. Their mission is to accelerate the growth of the companies they back, creating value for everyone involved in their investments. They invest in management teams who have a real ambition to succeed. They do this in a unique way with a distinctive mix of Investment and Operating Partners who all share the same straightforward values. This is what attracts the best managers to work with them â€“ managers who create the value that, in turn, attracts their investor clients.
